This site is updating in the open

Things might look a little janky for a bit, but that’s okay! I am in the process of replatforming this site to use Eleventy, as well as refreshing the design. Follow along on GitHub.

Were you browsing my site?

Please and I’ll fix it.

Did you come here from another site?

Sometimes links aren’t written properly. Sometimes I’ve changed things around on my site since the other site wrote a link that points here. If either are the case, please let me know about and I’ll ask them to fix it.

Did you type a URL to get here?

Double-check your browser’s address bar to make sure you typed it correctly, or head home to try again.
